context_help.chat: In Chat mode, you can interact with the AI as you would in a normal conversation. Type your questions or statements, and the AI will respond accordingly.
context_help.query: In Query mode, you can submit specific queries for the AI to process. This is suitable for more structured or data-specific requests. Enter your queries, and the AI will attempt to provide a detailed answer.

actions.what_can_i_do: What can I do for you?
